title: The Gaining Paths to Investment Success: Information-Driven LLM Graph Reasoning for Venture Capital Prediction
summary: Most venture capital (VC) investments fail, while a few deliver outsized returns. Accurately predicting startup success requires synthesizing complex relational evidence, including company disclosures, investor track records, and investment network structures, through explicit reasoning to form coherent, interpretable investment theses.
